pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video offers a dramatic, close-up aerial perspective of a massive glacier. The shot highlights the deep, icy crevasses and jagged formations of the glacier, which sits adjacent to a dark, rocky mountain under a cloudy sky. The camera moves swiftly through this immense and rugged landscape.
